fields.description:
Java 8's javadoc seems to be stricter than the Java 7 one. With the current HEAD (commit e5ed4ff), mvn javadoc:javadoc passes with Java 7, but fails on the same machine with Java 8 (environment described above) with the following errors: [ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-javadoc-plugin:2.10.4:javadoc (default-cli) on project commons-lang3: An error has occurred in JavaDocs report generation: [ERROR] Exit code: 1 - /home/amureini/src/git/commons-lang/src/main/java/org/apache/commons/lang3/ArrayUtils.java:8421: warning: no @param for [ERROR] public static T[] insert(final int index, final T[] array, final T... values) { [ERROR] ^ [ERROR] /home/amureini/src/git/commons-lang/src/main/java/org/apache/commons/lang3/StringUtils.java:316: error: unexpected end tag:

[ERROR] *

Whitespace is defined by {@link Character#isWhitespace(char)}.

[ERROR] ^ [ERROR] /home/amureini/src/git/commons-lang/src/main/java/org/apache/commons/lang3/StringUtils.java:316: error: unexpected end tag:

[ERROR] *

Whitespace is defined by {@link Character#isWhitespace(char)}.

fixVersions.description: Feature and bugfix release, requires at least Java 7

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed
